tool_description: API for getting basic country info like name, code, dial-code, flag, currency-code, continent.
name: Country API
title: Country API

api_list.name: locations/{id}
Locations
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-api1.p.rapidapi.com/locations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://country-api1.p.rapidapi.com/locations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
